Reviews Package
===============

This package manages product reviews and ratings. It provides functionalities for submitting, updating, deleting, retrieving, and moderating reviews for products.

Overview
--------

The Reviews package enables customers to leave feedback on products, and administrators to moderate and manage these reviews. The main functionalities include:

- **Submit Review**: Allows customers to submit ratings and comments on products.
- **Update Review**: Enables customers to update their reviews.
- **Delete Review**: Allows both customers and administrators to delete reviews.
- **Get Product Reviews**: Lists all reviews for a specific product.
- **Get Customer Reviews**: Lists all reviews submitted by a specific customer.
- **Get Review Details**: Retrieves the details of a specific review.
- **Moderate Review**: Allows administrators to approve or reject a review.
